usage.cn: 做个快乐的人。那是英明智慧的一条路径。- Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
usage.eng: Be happy. It's one way of being wise.

usage.cn: 和你在一起就像在一个清爽的早晨漫步。
usage.eng: Being with you is like walking on a very clear morning.

usage.cn: 单身，并不意味着你不懂爱情
usage.eng: Being single doesn't mean that you don't know anything about love.

usage.cn: “生于这世上，没有一样感情不是千疮百孔的。”
usage.eng: There's no sentiment without being injured when living in this world.
